review.reviewBody: Sesame chicken and crispy ginger beef are the best I've had in a long time! Great sauces and both were quite crispy.

Seriously.....this place never disappoints. Ho fan noodles and ginger beef were foods I thought I'd never enjoy again being Celiac. This place understands Celiac Disease and cross contamination- this place has become one of my trusted takeout places!
most amazing and delicious gluten free Chinese food 😋
This is the only restaurant I trust for gf Chinese food. Having celiac its amzong that I can order food ans its great quality! The salt and pepper prawns are amazing! Never dissapoints.
Celiac disease here (gluten allergy), cannot believe I can continually eat this safely no issues ... tastes like very high quality Chinese food
